Text:
Thanks for sharing. Very informative.
Thanks for your autograph on the opening page :)
Thank you! You are the king of ebooks!

Can you upload following book, please,

Handbook of Vanilla Science and Technology
Hardcover: 360 pages
Publisher: Wiley-Blackwell; 1 edition (January 4, 2011)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 1405193255
ISBN-13: 978-1405193252

Cheers
Kumar

Hi SectorVector, 
Nice to know you liked my autograph.
This time I did not put a hyperlink in it!
I plan to use it in all books I scan henceforth.
